topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: dspam-filter
short_description: dspam-filter is a filter to invoke the anti-spam tool DSPAM directly from the embedded maildrop in vpopmail via dot-qmail forwarding. DSPAM masquerades as the email server's LDA.  However most users of Qmail prefer to leave the qmail-queue intact.
